docs.snippet: Pep Guardiola was delighted with what he saw from Manchester City during their 4-1 Premier League victory at Stoke City on Saturday, but he has warned there is plenty more to come from his side....
docs.lead_paragraph: Pep Guardiola was delighted with what he saw from Manchester City during their 4-1 Premier League victory at Stoke City on Saturday, but he has warned there is plenty more to come from his side.

headline.main: More to Come From Impressive City, Says Guardiola
headline.print_headline: More to Come From Impressive City, Says Guardiola

headline.main: Aguero Strikes Twice as Man City Thrash Stoke
headline.print_headline: Aguero Strikes Twice as Man City Thrash Stoke

docs.snippet: Countries and companies vie for the title of Rio’s Best Party, offering night life to athletes once their competitions are over....
docs.lead_paragraph: Countries and companies vie for the title of Rio’s Best Party, offering night life to athletes once their competitions are over.
docs.abstract: Olympic officials and athletes celebrate across Rio de Janeiro at hospitality houses, many of them multi-million dollar enterprises, sponsored by countries and corporations to use as promotional vehicles.

headline.main: At the Olympics, the Thrill of Victory, the Agony of Defeat and the Lure of the Dance Floor

docs.snippet: When the No. 1 TV station of sports-mad Australia revealed its Olympics broadcast would wipe $50 million (£38.2 million) from annual profits, it was more than a warning for shareholders - it was a sign that the business model of the Games was...
docs.lead_paragraph: When the No. 1 TV station of sports-mad Australia revealed its Olympics broadcast would wipe $50 million (£38.2 million) from annual profits, it was more than a warning for shareholders - it was a sign that the business model of the Games was being shaken up.

headline.main: Olympics Broadcasting Outlook as Clear as Rio's Diving Pool
headline.print_headline: Olympics Broadcasting Outlook as Clear as Rio's Diving Pool

docs.snippet: The pole vault world-record holder was banned. The hometown favorite didn't make it through qualifying....
docs.lead_paragraph: The pole vault world-record holder was banned. The hometown favorite didn't make it through qualifying.

headline.main: A Sick Jenn Suhr Can't Defend Title in Olympic Pole Vault
headline.print_headline: A Sick Jenn Suhr Can't Defend Title in Olympic Pole Vault

docs.snippet: Russian whistleblower Yulia Stepanova may be in danger after her revelations on doping in her country that triggered a massive scandal and forced her to flee, but it is not the International Olympic Committee's responsibility, the IOC said on Satu...
docs.lead_paragraph: Russian whistleblower Yulia Stepanova may be in danger after her revelations on doping in her country that triggered a massive scandal and forced her to flee, but it is not the International Olympic Committee's responsibility, the IOC said on Saturday.

headline.main: Any Danger to Whistleblower Stepanova Not an IOC Issue-Bach
headline.print_headline: Any Danger to Whistleblower Stepanova Not an IOC Issue-Bach

docs.snippet: Europe's former top Olympic official has traded the height of luxury at his beachfront hotel in Rio for a notorious maximum-security prison where he gets the same food and standard shaved haircut as the other inmates, a prison official said on Sat...
docs.lead_paragraph: Europe's former top Olympic official has traded the height of luxury at his beachfront hotel in Rio for a notorious maximum-security prison where he gets the same food and standard shaved haircut as the other inmates, a prison official said on Saturday.

headline.main: IOC's Hickey Shares Prison Cell With THG Executive
headline.print_headline: IOC's Hickey Shares Prison Cell With THG Executive

docs.snippet: In the Olympics, women can paddle a kayak but not a canoe. Some men think it should stay that way....
docs.lead_paragraph: In the Olympics, women can paddle a kayak but not a canoe. Some men think it should stay that way.

headline.main: Kayak Men Assail Plans for Women's Canoe in Next Olympics
headline.print_headline: Kayak Men Assail Plans for Women's Canoe in Next Olympics

docs.snippet: Serbia's world champion men’s water polo team defeated arch rivals Croatia 11-7 to win their first Olympic gold medal in the sport and dethrone the title holders on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Serbia's world champion men’s water polo team defeated arch rivals Croatia 11-7 to win their first Olympic gold medal in the sport and dethrone the title holders on Saturday.

headline.main: Serbia on a Roll With Gold Medal in Water Polo
